entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
